blogPost.excerpt: SalesLab CRM for long cycle sales. We strive to make the most user-friendly CRM in the world. Yes, we still have much work to do to achieve this, but we are ready for it!
blogPost.body: SalesLab CRM for long cycle sales. We strive to make the most user-friendly CRM in the world. Yes, we still have much work to do to achieve this, but we are ready for it!
blogPost.title: SalesLab CRM - Easy to use, easy to sell
blogPost.author: Oliver Grand

localize.description: 销售实验室CRM，实现长周期销售。我们努力打造世界上最人性化的CRM。是的，为了实现这个目标，我们还有很多工作要做，但我们已经做好了准备!
銷售實驗室CRM，實現長週期銷售。我們努力打造世界上最人性化的CRM。是的，爲了實現這個目標，我們還有很多工作要做，但我們已經做好了準備!

previous.excerpt: These Earrings are fully packed with the latest technology embedded in real pearls to provide you with music, phone calls and digital assistants all day long.
previous.title: Nova H1 - Clip-on earrings that work as headphones

localize.description: 这款耳饰完全采用了最新的技术，嵌入了真正的珍珠，为您提供一整天的音乐、电话和数字助理。

localize.description: 這款耳飾完全採用了最新的技術，嵌入了真正的珍珠，爲您提供一整天的音樂、電話和數字助理。
localize.tagline: 可作爲耳機使用的夾式耳環

next.excerpt: ⚠️ Not affiliated with Ray.so ⚠️ Ray.so is a beautiful code snippet generator you can use to show off your code, and now you can use it without leaving your code editor! Just highlight the code you want to upload, and run the RayThis command in VSCode! 🚀📷
next.title: RayThis - Generate pretty code snippets right out of VSCode

localize.description: ⚠️不隶属于Ray.so⚠️Ray.so是一个漂亮的代码片段生成器，你可以用它来展示你的代码，现在你可以不离开你的代码编辑器就能使用它! 只要高亮显示你要上传的代码，然后在VSCode中运行RayThis命令就可以了! 🚀📷
localize.tagline: 从VSCode中直接生成漂亮的代码片段。

localize.description: ⚠️不隸屬於Ray.so⚠️Ray.so是一個漂亮的代碼片段生成器，你可以用它來展示你的代碼，現在你可以不離開你的代碼編輯器就能使用它! 只要高亮顯示你要上傳的代碼，然後在VSCode中運行RayThis命令就可以了! 🚀📷
localize.tagline: 從VSCode中直接生成漂亮的代碼片段。
